title: Google
description: Google LLC is an American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products.

title: Coca-Cola
description: The Coca-Cola Company is an American multinational beverage corporation incorporated under Delaware's General Corporation Law and headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia.

title: Tesla
description: Tesla, Inc. is an American electric vehicle and clean energy company based in Palo Alto, California, United States.

title: Amazon
description: Amazon.com, Inc. is an American multinational conglomerate which focuses on e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence.
